name: rafting (MiguelTD)
description:
LORE:

There is no LORE this time. I mean, if someone has a LORE idea, just send in the comment section

Controls:

this is my first game that can be played on computer, with a controller and mobile!

in computer, walk with the arrows keys

in controller, walk with the left joystick

in mobile, walk by hold and drag the character.
